description.narrative: Efficient and good quality administration and management of the organisation and its activities.
En förvaltning och ledning av organisation och verksamhet med hög effektivitet och god kvalitet.
Administration and management of the Nordic Africa Institute including research support activities.
Förvaltning och ledning av Nordiska Afrikainstitutet inklusive forskningsstöd.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: In 2021 the institute has continued to develop administration and management for increased efficiency with particular focus on development of digital work processes, competence development and work enviroment related issues. Cooperation and networks with other public authorities have been strengthened including services from the State Service Center. Efforts to strengthen the systematic work on environment/sustainability and competence development linked to information security have been actively integrated in activities at the institute. Administration of the agency has during the pandemic year of 2021 been affected by the lower activity level within core operational areas (less travelling, paused scholarship progammes, less instituional visits, digitalised conference activities etc). The instruction for staff of the agency to work from home large parts of the year has also resutled in a decrease of administrative expenditure in 2021.

Under 2021 har fortsatt utveckling och effektivisering av myndighetens förvaltning skett med särskilt fokus på utveckling av digitala arbetsprocesser, kompetensförsörjning samt arbetsmiljörelaterade frågor. Samarbeten och nätverk med andra statliga myndigheter har fortlöpande skett inklusive från Statens Servicecenter. Insatser för att stärka det systematiska arbetet om miljö/hållbarhet samt kompetensutveckling inom informationssäkerhetsområdet har integrerats i myndighetens verksamhet. Förvaltningen och den interna administrationen har under pandemiåret 2021 påverkats av minskade aktiviteter i kärnverksamheten (minskat resande, pausade stipendieprogram, färre institutionella besök, digitaliserad konferensverksamhet osv). Uppmaningen till hemarbete av myndighetens personal under stora delar av året har påverkat minskningen av förvaltningskostnader under 2021.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
